name: Frostbite Mammoth
text: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard any number of non-Ritual "Frostbite" monsters, increase this card's Level by 1 for each card discarded. If this card is in your Graveyard while you control a "Frostbite" Ritual Monster, you can banish 2 "Frostbite" monsters from your Graveyard, Special Summon this card in Defense Positon. You can only activate each effect of "Frostbite Mammoth" once per turn.
